name: Prayer of Mending
description: Places a ward on an ally that heals them the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 20 yds. Jumps up to 5 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.

name: Shadow Word: Death
description: A word of dark binding that inflicts Shadow damage to the target. If the target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, the caster takes damage equal to the damage inflicted upon the target. Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.

name: Renew
description: Fill the target with faith in the light, healing over 15 sec.

name: Focused Mending
description: Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.

name: Purify Disease
description: Removes all Disease effects from a friendly target.

name: Improved Shadow Word: Death [NNF]
description: Shadow Word: Death's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.

name: Shadow Mend
description: Wraps an ally in shadows which heal, but at a price. The ally will take damage every 1 sec, until they have taken a small amount of damage from all sources, or leave combat.

name: Renewed Faith
description: Your healing is increased by [5/10] % on targets with your Renew. Two Rank Talent.

name: Benediction
description: Your Prayer of Mending has a 25% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.

name: Improved Smite
description: Smite deals [25/50] % increased damage. Two Rank Talent.

name: Choice Node
description:
Body and Soul
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.

Angelic Feather
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

name: Mind Restrain
description: Mind Blast prevents a small amount of damage dealt by the enemy. Two Rank Talent.

name: Masochism
description: When you cast Shadow Mend on yourself, its damage over time effect heals you instead, and reduces all damage you take by 10%.

name: Improved Mind Blast {NNF]
description: Mind Blast's cooldown reduced by [3/7.5] sec. Two Rank Talent.

name: Say Your Prayers
description: Prayer of Mending has a 6% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.

name: Enlightenment
description: You regenerate mana [5/10]% faster. Two Rank Talent.

name: Power Infusion
description: Infuses the target with power for 20 sec, increasing haste by 25%.

name: Twist of Fate
description: After healing a target below 35% health, you deal [10/20%] increased damage and [10/20]% increased healing for 10 sec. Two Rank Talent.

name: Taming the Shadows
description: Shadow Mend has a 15% chance to deal no damage.

name: Holy Nova
description: An explosion of holy light around you deals Holy damage to enemies and healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

name: Mass Dispel
description: Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets.

name: Mind Control
description: Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.

name: Shadowfiend
description: Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

name: Cleric's Armaments
description: Smite deals 10% additional damage while you are shielded.

name: Improved Holy Nova {NNF]
description: If your Holy Nova deals damage to at least 3 enemies, a second Holy Nova will be cast a moment later at 50% effectiveness at the same location.

name: Clear Mind
description: Dispel Magic, Purify, and Mass Dispel cost 20% less mana.

name: Angel's Mercy
description: Damage you take reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer, based on the amount of damage taken.

name: Dominant Mind
description: You may also control your own character while Mind Control is active, but Mind Control has a 2 min cooldown, and it may not be used against players.

name: Throes of Pain
description: Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage over its duration. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain [5/10]% Insanity and Mana. Two Rank Talent.

name: Improved Shadowfiend [NNF]
description: Your Shadowfiend now restores 1% mana/a fixed amount of Insanity to you whenever it attacks.

name: Tools of the Cloth
description: Holy Nova deals 10% additional damage while you are shielded.

name: Shackle Undead
description: Shackles the target undead enemy for 50 seconds, preventing all actions and movement. Damage will cancel the effect. Limit 1.

name: Twins of the Sun Priestess
description: Power Infusion also grants you [50/100] % of its effects when used on an ally. Two Rank Talent.

name: Puppet Master
description: Shadowfiend and Dominant Mind increase your Mastery by [3/6]% while active. Two Rank Talent.

name: Blessing of Renewal
description: Renew heals for an additional 5% and its mana cost is reduced by 10%.

name: Charitable Soul
description: Casting Power Word: Shield on an ally also shields you for [5/10]% of the amount for 10 sec. Two Rank Talent.

name: Translucent Image
description: For the first 5 sec of Fade, you take [5/10]% reduced damage. Two Rank Talent.

name: Mindbender
description: Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. You regenerate 0.5% of maximum mana/a fixed amount of Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.

name: Unwavering Will
description: While above 75% health, the cast times of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by [10/20]%. Two Rank Talent.

name: Light's Inspiration
description: Desperate Prayer heals you for an additional [5/10]% of your maximum health over 5 sec. Two Rank Talent.

name: Tithe Evasion
description: Shadow Word: Death deals [10/20]% less damage to the caster. Two Rank Talent.

name: Rabid Shadows
description: Your Shadowfiend's attack speed is increased by [5/10]%. Two Rank Talent.

name: Holy Word: Life
description: A word of holy power that heals the target. If the target is not below 20% health, the caster takes damage equal to the amount healed. Healing is increased by 150% to targets below 20% health. Instant Cast, 30 second cooldown.

name: Crystalline Reflection
description: Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 514 and reflects 20% of damage absorbed.

name: Mindgames
description: Assault an enemy's mind, dealing Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality. For 5 sec, a small amount of damage they deal will heal their target, and a small amount of healing healing they deal will damage their target . Reversed damage and healing restore up to 4% mana.

name: Shadowflame Prism
description: Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for Shadowflame damage. Each time a rift is triggered, the duration of Shadowfiend is increased by 1.0 sec.
